summary: Only clear, verifiable UI responsiveness changes in the provided diff are limited to the outer container spacing and the header layout in `ImageResizeOptions.tsx` (e.g., responsive padding and flex direction). The diff is truncated before the mode selector (tabs/buttons) and the per-mode form rows, so REQ-1 and REQ-2 (and the rest of REQ-3) cannot be confirmed from the available evidence. No unrequested functional/backend changes are evidenced in the provided file diff summary.
